title: Watch this 7-year-old’s exchange with Sen. Tom Cotton over Trump’s border wall
text: Watch this 7-year-old’s exchange with Sen. Tom Cotton over Trump’s border wall   During a town hall meeting in Springdale, Ark., Feb. 22, a 7-year-old boy told Sen. Tom Cotton (R-Ark.) that “Donald Trump makes Mexicans not important to people who are in Arkansas who like Mexicans.” ( ) RELATED LINKS - During a town hall meeting in Springdale, Ark., Feb. 22, a 7-year-old boy told Sen. Tom Cotton (R-Ark.) that “Donald Trump makes Mexicans not important to people who are in Arkansas who like Mexicans.” ( ) Watch this 7-year-old’s exchange with Sen. Tom Cotton over Trump’s border wall ( 2:34 ) Playlist Politics
